testcase.name: Invalid booking id
testcase.system-err: expected:<405> but was:<404> actions.Actions.assertStatusCode(Actions.java:21) steps.Steps.theStatusCodeShouldBe(Steps.java:28) ✽.the status code should be 404(file:src/test/resources/features/UpdateBooking.feature:11)

testcase.name: Invalid booking information
testcase.system-err: expected:<200> but was:<400> actions.Actions.assertStatusCode(Actions.java:21) steps.Steps.theStatusCodeShouldBe(Steps.java:28) ✽.the status code should be 400(file:src/test/resources/features/UpdateBooking.feature:15)

testcase.name: Unauthorized access
testcase.system-err: expected:<403> but was:<401> actions.Actions.assertStatusCode(Actions.java:21) steps.Steps.theStatusCodeShouldBe(Steps.java:28) ✽.the status code should be 401(file:src/test/resources/features/UpdateBooking.feature:19)

testcase.name: Successfully update a current booking with XML body
testcase.system-err: expected:<400> but was:<200> actions.Actions.assertStatusCode(Actions.java:21) steps.Steps.theStatusCodeShouldBe(Steps.java:28) ✽.the status code should be 200(file:src/test/resources/features/UpdateBooking.feature:23)

testcase.name: Successfully update a current booking with URL-encoded body
testcase.system-err: expected:<415> but was:<200> actions.Actions.assertStatusCode(Actions.java:21) steps.Steps.theStatusCodeShouldBe(Steps.java:28) ✽.the status code should be 200(file:src/test/resources/features/UpdateBooking.feature:27)
